title: Mechanic
description: A person engaged in the construction, maintenance, or repair of machinery. Depicted wearing overalls and holding a wrench. Frequently also shown wearing a billed cap.
apple_vendor_description: The mechanic emoji on Apple devices presents a skilled individual with a confident, approachable demeanor, sporting a classic blue work uniform.  Apple‚Äôs signature glossy 3D shading and realistic lighting give the overalls and tool belt a tangible texture, hinting at practical expertise.  Its soft rounded edges and the subtle sheen on the wrench convey a sense of readiness and capability, often used to signify repair, hard work, or DIY projects.
